fields.title: The Batman
fields.writer: Matt Reeves, Peter Craig, Bill Finger
fields.plot: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

fields.title: Dune
fields.writer: Jon Spaihts, Denis Villeneuve, Eric Roth
fields.plot: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.
